title: Short-Term Course for Strengthening Hansen’s Disease Educational Expertise Using Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A digital-based modular learning environment for elementary and secondary school teachers to strengthen competencies in Hansen’s disease education.

learning_goals: Explain the etiology, transmission routes, and prevention methods of Hansen’s disease with over 85% accuracy via mobile devices.
Successfully perform Hansen’s disease diagnosis scenarios at least three times using digital simulation tools.
Apply social bias mitigation strategies presented in microlearning content to actual lesson design.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
